name: Super reaKtor
description:
Super reaKtor is a survival / scoring game, created during the OctoJam 2022.

A game by 

- Sushi : https://sushift5.itch.io 

- zriL : https://zril.itch.io 

- Ombre-vent : https://soundcloud.com/ombre-vent

INSTRUCTIONS

SURVIVE

Grab green/blue pickups with your central beam to heal, and protext your Wheels (green) from the red obstacles.

You can destroy obstacles with your Beam !

GAMEPAD CONTROLS

Left Stick : Move

Shoulder/Trigger buttons : Rotate

South / East buttons : Grow/Shrink

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

WASD : Move

J / L : Rotate

I / K : Grow Shrink

You move, rotate and heal faster when small.

Good luck !
